## FingerprintsEnroll.unenroll() method

Deletes the fingerprint enrollment.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unenroll(position?: FingerPosition | Finger | Array<FingerPosition | Finger>): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  position | <code>FingerPosition &#124; Finger &#124; Array&lt;FingerPosition &#124; Finger&gt;</code> | a position(s) of a finger(s) to delete. If not defined, all enrolled fingerprintss will be deleted. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

a promise to delete the enrollment or reject in case of an error.
